original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya

original: 11.17. Sanidassanattika, Vedanāttikādi
analyzed: sa ni dassana attika vedanā attika ādi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca … (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate tiṁsa.
analyzed: na sanidassana sa paṭigham na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe avigate tisa

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca … (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate tiṁsa.
analyzed: na sanidassana sa paṭigham na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe avigate tisa

analyzed: na sanidassana sa paṭigham na adukkham asukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe avigate tisa

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naanupādinnupādāniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe….

original: Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate tiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe avigate tisa

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca … (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate tiṁsa.

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe….
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na a saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca pe

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca … (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate tiṁsa.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na a saṅkiliṭṭha asaṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe avigate tisa

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasavitakkasavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe….
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na sa vitakka sa vicāram dhammam paṭicca pe

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naavitakkavicāramattaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate tiṁsa.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na a vitakka vicāra mattam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe avigate tisa

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naavitakkaavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na a vitakka avicāram dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ napītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na pīti sahagatam dhammam paṭicca pe na sa nidassana sa paṭigha

original: nasukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naupekkhāsahagataṁ
analyzed: na sukha sahagatam dhammam paṭicca pe na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na upekkhā sahagata

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate tiṁsa.
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe avigate tisa

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: na sanidassana sa paṭigham na dassanena pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca pe na sanidassana sa paṭigha

original: nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate tiṁsa.
analyzed: na bhāvanāya pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe avigate tisa

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na sani dassana sa paṭigham na na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: na sanidassana sa paṭigham na dassanena pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca pe na sanidassana sa paṭigha

original: nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe
analyzed: na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe

original: nava …pe… avigate tiṁsa.
analyzed: nava pe a vigate tisa

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na sani dassana sa paṭigham na na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naācayagāmiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naapacayagāmiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate tiṁsa.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na ācaya gāmim dhammam paṭicca pe na sanidassana sappaṭigham na apacaya gāmim dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe avigate tisa

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanevācayagāmināpacayagāmiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na sanidassana sa ppaṭigham na na iva ācaya gāmin na apacaya gāmim dhammam paṭicca

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naasekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate tiṁsa.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na sekkham dhammam paṭicca pe na sanidassana sappaṭigham na asekkham dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe avigate tisa

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanevāsekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa ppaṭigham na nevāsekkha nāsekkham dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naparittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na sanidassana sa paṭigham na parittam dhammam paṭicca

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ namahaggataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naappamāṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate tiṁsa.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na mahaggatam dhammam paṭicca pe na sanidassana sappaṭigham na appamāṇam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe avigate tisa

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naparittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… sanidassanasappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na paritta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca pe

original: namahaggatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naappamāṇārammaṇaṁ
analyzed: na mahaggata ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca pe na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na appamāṇa ārammaṇa

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate tiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe avigate tisa

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahīnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate tiṁsa.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na hīnam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe avigate tisa

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ namajjhimaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ napaṇītaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate tiṁsa.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na paṇītam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe avigate tisa

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ namicchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na micchatta niyatam dhammam paṭicca pe

original: nasammattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate tiṁsa.
analyzed: na sammatta niyatam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe avigate tisa

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na aniyatam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava vipākam natthi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ namaggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na magga ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca pe na sanidassana sappaṭigha

original: namaggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ namaggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: na magga hetukam dhammam paṭicca pe na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na magga adhipatim dhamma

original: paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate tiṁsa.
analyzed: paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe avigate tisa

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naanuppannaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nauppādiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate tiṁsa.
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na anuppannam dhammam paṭicca pe na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na auppādim dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe avigate tisa

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naatītaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naanāgataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na atītam dhammam paṭicca pe na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na anāgatam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate tiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe avigate tisa

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naatītārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na atīta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca pe na sanidassana sappaṭigha

original: naanāgatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ napaccuppannārammaṇaṁ
analyzed: na anāgata ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca pe na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na paccuppanna ārammaṇa

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate tiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe avigate tisa

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naajjhattaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nabahiddhā dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na ajjhattam dhammam paṭicca pe na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na bahiddhā dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate tiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe avigate tisa

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na ajjhatta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: naajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naajjhattārammaṇaṁ
analyzed: na ajjhatta ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na ajjhatta ārammaṇa

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho naajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ na ajjhatta ārammaṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… aññamaññe pañcavīsa …pe… avigate tiṁsa. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe aññamaññe pañcavīsa pe avigate tisa sabbattha vitthāro

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nabahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na bahiddha ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: nabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nabahiddhārammaṇaṁ
analyzed: na bahiddhā ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na bahiddhā ārammaṇa

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho nabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ na bahiddha ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nabahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho
analyzed: na sa nidassana sappaṭigham na bahiddha ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na a nidassana appaṭighaḥ

original: nabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… cha.
analyzed: na bahiddha ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe cha

original: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nabahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho nabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
analyzed: na anidassana sappaṭigham na bahiddhā ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ na bahiddhā ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā cha

original: Naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ nabahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
analyzed: na anidassana appaṭigham na bahiddha ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na bahiddha ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā cha

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nabahiddhārammaṇañca naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ nabahiddhārammaṇañca
analyzed: na sa nidassana sappaṭigham na bahiddha ārammaṇam ca na anidassana appaṭigham na bahiddha ārammaṇam ca

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na bahiddhā ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā cha

original: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nabahiddhārammaṇañca naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ nabahiddhārammaṇañca
analyzed: na anidassana sappaṭigham na bahiddha ārammaṇam ca na anidassana appaṭigham na bahiddha ārammaṇam ca

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na bahiddha ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: … cha. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: cha saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… aññamaññe pañcavīsa …pe… avigate tiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe aññamaññe pañcavīsa pe avigate tisa

original: (Sahajātavārepi paccayavārepi nissayavārepi saṁsaṭṭhavārepi sampayuttavārepi pañhāvārepi vitthāro.)
analyzed: sahajāta vāre pi paccaya vāre pi nissaya vāre sa saṭṭha vāre pi sampayutta vāre pi pañhā vāre pi vitthāraḥ
